description: This file defines a React component for a carousel UI, including context, hooks, and subcomponents for navigation and content display, utilizing the embla-carousel-react library.

classes.name: Carousel
classes.description: A React component that renders a customizable carousel with navigation controls.

classes.name: CarouselContent
classes.description: A component that renders the content area of the carousel.

classes.name: CarouselItem
classes.description: A component representing an individual slide within the carousel.

classes.name: CarouselPrevious
classes.description: A button component to navigate to the previous slide.

classes.name: CarouselNext
classes.description: A button component to navigate to the next slide.

methods.name: useCarousel
methods.description: Custom hook to access carousel context.
